member.summary: Callback function to handle CommandResponse (Async function call output) events received from the Scanner SDK

member.summary: Callback function to handle ScanRMD (Firmware Download) events received from the Scanner SDK

member.summary: Callback function to handle Video events received from the Scanner SDK

member.name: M:CSProxy.CoreScannerProxy.OnImageEvent(System.Int16,System.Int32,System.Int16,System.Object@,System.String@)
member.summary: Callback function to handle Image events received from the Scanner SDK
member.param: Complete Image Capture event send eventtype as "1"

member.name: M:CSProxy.CoreScannerProxy.OnPNPEvent(System.Int16,System.String@)
member.summary: Callback function to handle PnP events received from the Scanner SDK
member.param: Type of the event (Attached or Detached)
Assert tracking informations about attached/ detached scanner
member.remarks: If you are not interested in PnP events please do not register for the PnP events. Removing this function may arrise compilation errors. Blocking this function blocks all the events

member.name: M:CSProxy.CoreScannerProxy.OnBarcodeEvent(System.Int16,System.String@)
